asd.fgh.minesweeper.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • asd.fgh.minesweeper.logic.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    The UI facing class; has the required methods for playing the game, generates the board internally. A user interface needs to be set with setUserInterface before attempting to play the game, otherwise will crash.
    Author:
    ahv

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Difficulty difficulty)
      Constructor for preset games, values defined in GameSettings class.
      Game(int mines, int width, int height)
      Constructor for custom games, values are validated internally in a GameSettings object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int mines,
            int width,
            int height)
        Constructor for custom games, values are validated internally in a GameSettings object.
        Parameters:
        mines - Amount of mines in the game, between 1 and total amount of grids.
        width - Width of the game board.
        height - Height of the game board.
        See Also:
        GameSettings.GameSettings(int, int, int)

      • Game

        public Game(Difficulty difficulty)
        Constructor for preset games, values defined in GameSettings class.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - Enum to identify a preset in GameSettings.
        See Also:
        GameSettings.generatePreset(asd.fgh.minesweeper.logic.Difficulty)

    • Method Detail

      • getSettings

        public GameSettings getSettings()

      • setUserInterface

        public void setUserInterface(UserInterface ui)

      • openGridAt

        public void openGridAt(int x,
                       int y)
        Player input to attempt to open a grid in the game.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate.
        y - Y-coordinate.

      • flagGridAt

        public void flagGridAt(int x,
                       int y)
        Places or removes a flag on an unrevealed grid.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate.
        y - Y-coordinate.

      • openAdjacentsAt

        public void openAdjacentsAt(int x,
                            int y)
        Special functionality for automatically opening adjacent grids. When used on a revealed grid that has an equal amount of adjacent mined and flagged grids will open all unflagged grids.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate.
        y - Y-coordinate.
